info.name: Guardian
info.description:
The Guardian is a modular open-source solution that includes best-in-class identity management and decentralized ledger technology (DLT) libraries. At the heart of the Guardian solution is a sophisticated Policy Workflow Engine (PWE) that enables applications to offer a requirements-based tokenization implementation.

Contact Support:
 Name: API developer
 Email: info@envisionblockchain.com

item.name: Returns a list of users, excluding Root Authority and Auditors.

request.description: Returns all users except those with roles Root Authority and Auditor. Only users with the Root Authority role are allowed to make the request.

response.name: Successful operation.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
